name.description: The name of the new workspace and initial project.

prefix.description: The prefix to apply to generated selectors for the initial project.

tslint.description: When true, rewrite the tslint.json file

pathMapping.description: When true, set the workspace path mapping in the tsconfig.json file

routing.description: When true, generates a routing module for the initial project.

inlineStyle.description: When true, includes styles inline in the root component.ts file. Only CSS styles can be included inline. Default is false, meaning that an external styles file is created and referenced in the root component.ts file.

inlineTemplate.description: When true, includes template inline in the root component.ts file. Default is false, meaning that an external template file is created and referenced in the root component.ts file.

viewEncapsulation.description: The view encapsulation strategy to use in the new app.

style.description: The file extension or preprocessor to use for style files.

skipTests.description: When true, does not create "spec.ts" test files for the app.

minimal.description: When true, creates a bare-bones project without any testing frameworks. (Use for learning purposes only.)
